tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Joy)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (DT all) (IN around)) (NP (NP (NP (PRP us)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN course)))) (, ,) (CC but) (NP (PRP$ its) (NP (ADVP (RB also)) (NP (DT a) (NN choice)) (, ,) (NP (DT an) (NN attitude)))))) (. .)))
